Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
A database that holds all created account information
Author:
Rory Xu, Hassan Alfareed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AccountDatabase()
    Constructs a new account database with a starting size of 4 accounts

  • Method Details

    • getAccounts

      public Account[] getAccounts()
      Gets the list of accounts in the database
      Returns:
      The database of accounts

    • findAccount

      public int findAccount(Account account)
      Finds the account in the database
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be found
      Returns:
      The index of the account if found, otherwise -1

    • isAccountClosed

      public boolean isAccountClosed(Account account)
      Checks if account is closed already in the database
      Parameters:
      account - The account to check
      Returns:
      True if closed, false if not

    • findChecking

      public int findChecking(Account account)
      Checks whether a holder already owns a checking account of either type
      Parameters:
      account - The account that the holder wishes to open
      Returns:
      The index of an already existing checking type account, or NOT_FOUND = -1

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Opens an account in the database Can reopen closed accounts
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be opened
      Returns:
      True if the opening was successful, false if it was not

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Closes an account in the database
      Parameters:
      account - The account to be closed
      Returns:
      True if the account was successfully closed, false if not

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Deposits money into an account in the database
      Parameters:
      account - The account to deposit money into

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Withdraws money from an account in the database
      Parameters:
      account - The account to deposit money into
      Returns:
      True if the withdrawal was successful, false if not

    • print

      public String print()
      Generates a string containing a list of all the accounts in the database
      Returns:
      The list of all the accounts in the database

      Sorts the accounts in the database alphabetically by type
      Parameters:
      accounts - The list of accounts
